long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optical is a font family and browser extension that customizes letters to low vision. Research suggests ways to improve letters for low vision, but low vision varies by source and degree. There are no one size fits all solutions in accessibility. Install the extension, fine tune your font and read the internet in letters set to your legibility needs.
